review: I was very surprised by the abilities in this little device. I am a Amazon fan!! I havent used any other service on the internet b/c Most of my needs are met with amazon. Most important, it's affordable. I live on a strict budget, I am a single Mother with 3 children. There is onlt one thing that I have had a problem with and that is when the device gets HOT (to the touch) , it doesnt work. My remote will not be able to stop the choices from running on and on. Example: If I choose Netflis and Press it with my remote, My choices start rolling on the screen and I can't stop it until I unplug the fire stick and let it cool off. Then it works normal again. Thanks again.
